title: Ep - 161 - RYAN SUTTER FROM THE BACHELORETTE / LYNNE CURTIN FROM REAL HOUSEWIVES OF ORANGE COUNTY
description:
Ryan Sutter won Trista Rehn’s heart and hand in marriage after season one of The Bachelorette. He discusses the reality of winning the show and how long it takes to get over competing against another suitor in the finals of the show. He also catches us up on life now in Colorado. Trista and Ryan have been married since 2003 and have two children.


Lynne Curtin appeared on Real Housewives of Orange County’s 4th and 5th season. She opens up about how her marriage fell apart on camera, the unforgettable moment with the eviction notice, and how life has changed since the show.


Author Leslie Bruce helps Kate review the first part of the Vanderpump Rules reunion.


Luz Ortiz appears this season on Bravo’s new show Texicanas about a group of Mexican-American friends living in San Antonio, Texas.


Reality Life with Kate Casey
